20101222013620.000|20101222013622.000|CC1|CANNOT FAVOR PROGRAMS AND MOVIES
20101222013622.000|20101222013623.000|CC1|THEY PROVIDE OVER RIVALS LIKE   
20101222013623.000|20101222013626.000|CC1|NETFLIX.                        
20101222013626.000|20101222013627.000|CC1|THE CONCEPT IS CALLED "NET      
20101222013627.000|20101222013629.000|CC1|NEUTRALITY."                    
20101222013629.000|20101222013630.000|CC1|IT'S GROWING IN IMPORTANCE AS   
20101222013630.000|20101222013632.000|CC1|CONSUMERS INCREASINGLY WATCH TV 
20101222013632.000|20101222013633.000|CC1|AND MOVIES ONLINE, AS OPPOSED TO
20101222013633.000|20101222013634.000|CC1|CABLE.                          
20101222013634.000|20101222013636.000|CC1|BUT TODAY'S REGULATION IS LIKELY
20101222013636.000|20101222013639.000|CC1|TO FACE INTENSE SCRUTINY ON     
20101222013639.000|20101222013640.000|CC1|CAPITOL HILL ONCE REPUBLICANS   
20101222013640.000|20101222013643.000|CC1|TAKE OVER THE HOUSE.            
20101222013643.000|20101222013645.000|CC1|THE RESULTS ARE IN FROM THIS    
20101222013645.000|20101222013647.000|CC1|YEAR'S CENSUS REPORT, AND WE GOT
20101222013647.000|20101222013648.000|CC1|A LOOK TODAY AT HOW THE U.S. HAS
20101222013648.000|20101222013651.000|CC1|CHANGED OVER THE LAST DECADE.   
20101222013651.000|20101222013654.000|CC1|THE U.S. POPULATION NOW STANDS  
20101222013654.000|20101222013656.000|CC1|AT MORE THAN 308 MILLION PEOPLE.
20101222013656.000|20101222013658.000|CC1|THAT'S AN INCREASE OF NEARLY 10%
20101222013658.000|20101222013700.000|CC1|OVER THE LAST DECADE, BUT IT'S  
20101222013700.000|20101222013701.000|CC1|THE SLOWEST PACE OF GROWTH SINCE
20101222013701.000|20101222013704.000|CC1|1940.                           
20101222013704.000|20101222013706.000|CC1|THE REPORT SHOWS MORE AMERICANS 
20101222013706.000|20101222013708.000|CC1|ARE LIVING IN THE WEST AND      
20101222013708.000|20101222013710.000|CC1|THE SOUTH.                      
20101222013710.000|20101222013711.000|CC1|THE SOUTH HAD THE FASTEST GROWTH
20101222013711.000|20101222013715.000|CC1|SINCE 2000 AT 14.3%.            
20101222013715.000|20101222013716.000|CC1|THE WEST WAS CLOSE BEHIND AT    
20101222013716.000|20101222013719.000|CC1|13.8%.                          
20101222013719.000|20101222013721.000|CC1|CENSUS DATA IS USED TO DETERMINE
20101222013721.000|20101222013723.000|CC1|HOW MANY REPRESENTATIVES EACH   
20101222013723.000|20101222013723.000|CC1|STATE GETS IN THE HOUSE OVER THE
20101222013723.000|20101222013726.000|CC1|NEXT DECADE.                    
20101222013726.000|20101222013728.000|CC1|BASED ON TODAY'S DATA, TEXAS    
20101222013728.000|20101222013730.000|CC1|WILL GAIN FOUR SEATS, FLORIDA   
20101222013730.000|20101222013731.000|CC1|ADDS TWO, WHILE NEW YORK AND    
20101222013731.000|20101222013734.000|CC1|OHIO EACH LOST TWO.             
20101222013734.000|20101222013735.000|CC1|14 OTHER STATES GAINED OR LOST  
20101222013735.000|20101222013739.000|CC1|ONE SEAT.                       
20101222013739.000|20101222013740.000|CC1|THE GAINERS INCLUDED ARIZONA,   
20101222013740.000|20101222013741.000|CC1|GEORGIA, NEVADA, SOUTH CAROLINA 
20101222013741.000|20101222013743.000|CC1|AND UTAH.

20101222013746.000|20101222013749.000|CC1|JERSEY.                         
20101222013749.000|20101222013751.000|CC1|NO MATTER WHERE YOU LIVE, YOUR  
20101222013751.000|20101222013753.000|CC1|HEALTH IN THE FUTURE WILL       
20101222013753.000|20101222013755.000|CC1|DEPEND, IN PART, ON THE         
20101222013755.000|20101222013756.000|CC1|EDUCATION THE NEXT GENERATION OF
20101222013756.000|20101222013759.000|CC1|DOCTORS IS NOW RECEIVING.       
20101222013759.000|20101222013800.000|CC1|THAT'S WHY PHARMACEUTICAL       
20101222013800.000|20101222013801.000|CC1|COMPANIES SAY IT IS SO IMPORTANT

20101222013816.000|20101222013820.000|CC1|THOSE STUDENTS ARE TURNING THE  
20101222013820.000|20101222013820.000|CC1|TABLES BY GRADING THEIR OWN     
20101222013820.000|20101222013824.000|CC1|UNIVERSITIES.                   
20101222013824.000|20101222013825.000|CC1|>> Reporter: IT'S SATURDAY NIGHT
20101222013825.000|20101222013826.000|CC1|IN LAS VEGAS, AND FAR FROM THE  
20101222013826.000|20101222013829.000|CC1|BRIGHT LIGHTS, THESE MEDICAL    
20101222013829.000|20101222013830.000|CC1|STUDENTS ARE GATHERING FOR A    
20101222013830.000|20101222013832.000|CC1|LECTURE.                        
20101222013832.000|20101222013833.000|CC1|THE SUBJECT IS NOT CELL BIOLOGY 
20101222013833.000|20101222013834.000|CC1|OR ANATOMY.                     
20101222013834.000|20101222013835.000|CC1|>> YOU GUYS GET BOUGHT AND SOLD 
20101222013835.000|20101222013836.000|CC1|IN A BLINK OF AN EYE, AND YOU   
20101222013836.000|20101222013837.000|CC1|DON'T EVEN REALIZE IT           
20101222013837.000|20101222013838.000|CC1|>> Reporter: TODAY'S TOPIC IS   
20101222013838.000|20101222013839.000|CC1|MARKETING-- SPECIFICALLY, DRUG  
20101222013839.000|20101222013842.000|CC1|COMPANY MARKETING.              
20101222013842.000|20101222013843.000|CC1|AND THE LECTURER, SHAHRAM AHARI,
20101222013843.000|20101222013845.000|CC1|IS A FORMER PHARMACEUTICAL      
20101222013845.000|20101222013847.000|CC1|COMPANY SALES REP WHO LEFT THE  
20101222013847.000|20101222013847.000|CC1|PROFESSION TO BECOME A MEDICAL  
20101222013847.000|20101222013849.000|CC1|STUDENT HIMSELF.                
20101222013849.000|20101222013851.000|CC1|>> AS MUCH AS I LIKED TO THINK I
20101222013851.000|20101222013853.000|CC1|WAS HELPING PATIENTS, THE TRUTH

20101222013854.000|20101222013855.000|CC1|SHAREHOLDERS MORE THAN ANYONE

20101222013856.000|20101222013858.000|CC1|THE EXPENSE OF PATIENTS.        
20101222013858.000|20101222013859.000|CC1|>> Reporter: PROGRAMS LIKE THESE
20101222013859.000|20101222013900.000|CC1|ARE PART OF A CAMPAIGN TO CHANGE
20101222013900.000|20101222013901.000|CC1|THE CULTURE OF MEDICINE.        
20101222013901.000|20101222013902.000|CC1|AND IT'S BEING LED BY MEDICAL   
20101222013902.000|20101222013905.000|CC1|STUDENTS UNDER THE BANNER       
20101222013905.000|20101222013906.000|CC1|"PHARMFREE."                    
20101222013906.000|20101222013907.000|CC1|THE GOAL-- TO PUT SCIENTIFIC    
20101222013907.000|20101222013909.000|CC1|EVIDENCE AHEAD OF PHARMACEUTICAL
20101222013909.000|20101222013910.000|CC1|MARKETING IN THEIR EDUCATION AND
20101222013910.000|20101222013912.000|CC1|THEIR PROFESSION.               
20101222013912.000|20101222013914.000|CC1|JOHN BROCKMAN IS PRESIDENT OF   
20101222013914.000|20101222013916.000|CC1|THE AMERICAN MEDICAL STUDENT    
20101222013916.000|20101222013917.000|CC1|ASSOCIATION, WHICH RUNS THE     
20101222013917.000|20101222013918.000|CC1|PHARMFREE CAMPAIGN.             
20101222013918.000|20101222013920.000|CC1|>> WHEN I FIRST STARTED,

20101222015439.000|20101222015440.000|CC1|HAS HAPPENED TO THE REST OF THE

20101222015446.000|20101222015448.000|CC1|TO KNOCK SOME SENSE INTO

20101222015448.000|20101222015449.000|CC1|LATE.                           
20101222015449.000|20101222015450.000|CC1|HERE, AT LEAST, IS HOPING.
